max_sessions.description: Maximum number of open sessions in each host connection. Defaults to `3`.

password.description: The pasword for the user on the remote host.

port.description: The ssh port on the remote host. Defaults to `22`.

private_key.description: The private key used to login to the remote host.

private_key_env_var.description: The name of the local environment variable containing the private key used to login to the remote host.

private_key_path.description: The local path to the private key used to login to the remote host.

sudo.description: Use sudo to gain access to file. Defaults to `false`.

user.description: The user on the remote host.

block.description: Default connection to host where files are located. Can be overridden in resources and data sources.

path.description: Path to file on remote host.

result_conn.description: Computed conn for handling default functionality.
